name: Mini Golf: Idle Tycoon!
description:
Put down your putter and download Mini Golf: Idle Tycoon for free. Enter the fun and zany world of Grandpa Green’s Mini-Golf Course! The once-bustling course has seen better days, but that doesn't mean Grandpa Green is ready to call for a mulligan!

Play alongside Grandpa Green, who with the help of his grandkids, Zoey and Masons, aim to restore his dilapidated mini-golf course to its former glory! Joined by a crew of wacky and outlandish employees, tap and click to grow your idle empire and save the course!

Everybody knows that the best way to design a mini-golf course is to play one! Take a break from your hard work and play a round of putt putt within the game!


• INVEST IN GOLF! Tap & click to grow the family’s mini-golf course into a global putting empire! The more you tap, the more customers visit and the more money you can make!

• UNLOCK CHARACTERS! Hire eccentric employees whose love for the course’s hole easily makes up for their lack of conventionality!

• IMPROVE YOUR COURSE! Build, and upgrade dozens of far-out mini golf holes! Have you ever played a loopty loop hole? Yeah. How about one with 3 loops!

• EARN A PROFIT, DUDE! This ain’t your normal golf game! The highest score wins, so get to work earning higher and higher profits!

• PUTT, PUTT, CHILL! Hang in there, bud. After all, that tapping, play the course you worked so hard to build!

It’s never been easier than with Mini Golf: Idle Tycoon Game to grow a putt-putt empire (we even have a castle for that empire)! Mini Golf: Idle Tycoon is free to download and fun to play, with new content being added all the time! Download for free today and become an idle Mini Golf tycoon!

Mini Golf: Idle Tycoon is free to play, but some game items can be purchased for real money. A network connection is not required but will limit in-game functions.
